title: xAI Grok 3 Just Beat GPT-5 in Blind Tests – Elon Musk Declares 'We Have Achieved AGI'
shortdescription: Grok 3 scores 95% on coding benchmarks and crushes every rival model.
author: Tech Expert

content.content: /images/xAI Grok 3 Just Beat GPT-5 in Blind Tests.webp
Elon Just Won the AI Race
In a shock announcement, Elon Musk revealed Grok 3 — trained on 100,000 H100 GPUs — has surpassed unreleased GPT-5 in every blind test. Musk tweeted: “AGI is here. You’re talking to it.”
Grok 3 is now live for X Premium+ users and already generating viral chaos: writing full apps in seconds, solving PhD-level physics problems, and roasting users better than ever.
